name: Keya Swaminathan
text: I've never seen anything quite like it before. The movie was a shining example of what cinema can achieve. The movie was pure joy.

name: Dummy
text: The plot was so engaging, I was on the edge of my seat the whole time. The movie was a true delight from start to finish. The dialogue was witty and clever.

name: Riya Shere
text: I was completely enthralled by every moment of it.

name: Navya Bhardwaj
text: I was completely enchanted by the story. Such a heartwarming story, it brought tears to my eyes. The writing was sharp and witty.

name: Ela Dutta
text: 10/10 would recommend. The movie was a true joy to watch.

name: Indranil Sangha
text: I was blown away by the performances. A must-see for any movie lover.
